original_title: バスケ部の女子マネージャーは毎日、顧問教師の性処理をさせられています。
overview: The members, led by childhood friend Tatsuya, are aiming to win the tournament before retiring. Mr. Abe, the advisor who had no basketball experience, was unmotivated and didn't show up at practice, but when the results of last year's tournament became a topic, he was interviewed by the newspaper. He answered that it was the result of his enthusiastic guidance. …I despised my teacher. Such a teacher and Tatsuya clash, and the teacher says that he will quit his adviser...
title: Female Manager From The Basketball Club Offer Herself Over To Satisfy The Advisory Teacher Every Day. Hana Shirato
